mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(user_id, user_password, user_name, user_birthday, user_tel) VALUES(#{user_id}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{user_password}, SHA2('noobcamp', 256))), #{user_name}, #{user_birthday}, #{user_tel})
mapper.select: SELECT user_code, user_id, AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(user_password), SHA2('noobcamp', 256)) AS user_password, user_name, user_birthday, user_tel FROM user WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_password=HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{user_password}, SHA2('noobcamp', 256))), user_tel=#{user_tel}, user_birthday=#{user_birthday}, user_name=#{user_name} WHERE user_code=#{user_code}
